response.overview: Raspachilo is a gay fisherman. One day, when he was fishing, he found a mannequin in the swamp, that he decided to call Santa Travesti when he was cured of hemorrhoids. One night, after seeing his boyfriend in the cemetery in town, he gets infected with HIV. His Christian family decides to burn the mannequin. The next day, the shopkeeper in town is arrested as a scammer and child rapist in Tasajera, a Macondian city on the Colombian Caribbean coast.
response.title: Santa Travesti
